channel.title: [FoL] FoL 21 - Day 5 - The Realm of The Fallen King - BD and Mercenary win! (6/16)
channel.description:
# General Gameplay Information
Host is Frostwolf103 Co-hosts are Priestess & Solic
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 24 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 48 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * Day 1 lasts 24 hours and will not have an execution. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” (Host tip: Ping using @Frostwolf103 or @anon97870008 or @Solic for voting so we can track the votes) * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Journals
* PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
### Rolelist: **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer [/color] / [color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]**
## [Roles ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Playerlist
1. Isaac_Gonzalez 2. ~~Meteoro~~ / ~~BlueStorm~~ - Lynched Day 5 as [color=steblue]**The Maid**[/color] 3. ~~H_Hjasik~~ - Lynched D4 as [color=#86a94a]**The Mercenary**[/color] 4. [s]Boss110[/s] - Died N1 as [color=steblue]**The Physician**[/color] 5. ~~Alice~~ - Modkilled D4 as [color=indigo]**The Sorcerer**[/color] 6. ~~WazzaAzza~~ Lynched D2 as [color=purple]**The Assassin**[/color] 7. ~~Blizer~~~Died N3 as **[color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color]** 8. [s]Margaret[/s] - Died N1 as [color=steblue]**The Knight**[/color] 9. ~~Datbird~~ - Died N2 as [color=steblue]**The Knight**[/color] 10. Bazingaboy 11. Htm 12. ~~Possessed~~ - Lynched D3 as [color=purple]**The Mastermind**[/color] 13. ~~SoulShade55r~~ / Mathblade 14. ~~Magnus~~ / Shurian :crown: 15. ~~EzrealOfLaw~~ - Lynched D5 as [color=cfffe5]**The Warlock**[/color] 16. PoisonedSquid
### Timestamp: [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-fol-21-night-1-suspicion-rises/76766/127?u=frostwolf103]Start Day 1[/url]
[url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-fol-21-day-2-rude-awakening-14-16/76766/508?u=frostwolf103]Start Day 2[/url]
[WazzaAzza Lynch - End of Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-fol-21-day-2-rude-awakening-14-16/76766/1472?u=frostwolf103)
[Possessed Lynch - End of Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-fol-21-day-3-the-bird-is-the-word-12-16/76766/2438?u=frostwolf103)
[H_Hjasik's Lynch - End of Day 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-fol-21-day-4-have-you-heard-the-story-of-blizer-the-wise-9-16/76766/3691?u=frostwolf103)
[BlueStorm's Lynch - Day 5 continues](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-fol-21-day-5-apathy-is-death-8-16/76766/4005?u=frostwolf103) ### Backups:
1. Icibalus
### Spectators:
1. Firekitten

item.title: [FoL] FoL 21 - Day 5 - The Realm of The Fallen King - BD and Mercenary win! (6/16)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
“No…no!” Begs EzrealOfLaw of mercy upon cast of majority around the roundtable but glare of the eyes among the court knows too well he won’t live long and the guards dragged him away to the dark depths of the dungeon. They are…

The Warlock (Unofficial Class)

Neutral Offensive
Dark Magics (Passive) - You appear as a member of the Unseen or Cult (depending on which is present in the game) to investigations. Also, you are immune to death at night, once. This will not apply if attacked by a Blue Dragon player, however.
Detect Thoughts (Day) - Cast a spell that reveals your target’s last night action to you. - 4 uses
Carnage (Day) - Cast a spell that causes all kills tonight to bypass all forms of protection or prevention. - 1 use
Mind Control (Night) - Cast a spell that forces your target to target somebody of your choosing. - 3 uses
Seeming (Night) - Make yourself and one other person of your choice appear as members of the Blue Dragon to investigations. - 2 uses
See the blue dragon defeated at any cost.

King Shurian grabbed on his chest of burning pain inside as royal servants trying to remedy the king but to no avail, it turns out it wasn’t poison but a heart attack.

"Once upon a time there was a man, a wandering soul
Lost in the realm of our kingdom
They say he was a king who fought a great war
When the dragons came into our kingdom and burnt everyone with a roar,"

A imitation of dragon spewing fire and roar echoes around the king’s room catching everyone surprised but it was merely a illusion as the serene voice continues to tale to continue

"Once upon a time there was a kingdom, a beautiful one
Surrounded in darkness of an ancient war
They say there was a king, this wandering soul
Who’s cursed by a demon, forever, to watch his own realm rise and fall."

[The song played for the king]
(https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=tUVqnXD4C5U)

Blue Dragons and Mercenary are victiorious!

Read full topic
